	<item>
		<title>French Colonial home in the Issaquah Highlands</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/07/25/french-colonial-home-in-the-issaquah-highlands/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 26 Jul 2013 04:00:45 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1594</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[We love to show off our projects, and this one is particularly gorgeous. <a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Westview_Manor.html">Westview Manor</a> is a modern colonial style home with luxury and elegance around every corner.

[caption id="attachment_1595" align="aligncenter" width="560"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams__837_web.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1595" alt="french colonial home designed by upscale Bellevue Architect" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams__837_web.jpg" width="560" height="373" /></a> Westview Manor by Gelotte Hommas Architecture[/caption]

The home was designed for aging in place, and has a lovely spacious open floor plan. No detail was overlooked for both comfort and luxury. Check out this kitchen!

[caption id="attachment_1596" align="aligncenter" width="349"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_560v2_web.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1596" alt="White cabinets in this stunning kitchen" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_560v2_web.jpg" width="349" height="700" /></a> White cabinets in this stunning kitchen[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1597" align="aligncenter" width="467"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_616_web.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1597" alt="wide open layout for easy maneuvering " src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_616_web.jpg" width="467" height="700" /></a> wide open layout for easy maneuvering[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1598" align="aligncenter" width="467"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_630_web.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1598" alt="lovely tile backsplash" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_630_web.jpg" width="467" height="700" /></a> lovely tile back splash[/caption]

One of our favorite places in this home is by far the gorgeous master bathroom complete with built in vanity. {swoon}

[caption id="attachment_1599" align="aligncenter" width="560"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_240sv3_web-2.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1599" alt="A built in vanity sits center stage in this stunning french infused master bath" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130614_gh_williams_240sv3_web-2.jpg" width="560" height="423" /></a> A built in vanity sits center stage in this stunning french infused master bath[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1600" align="aligncenter" width="454"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130626_gh_williams__162_web-2.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1600" alt="The bath tub has a silver finish on the outside adding luster and elegance" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/07/20130626_gh_williams__162_web-2.jpg" width="454" height="700" /></a> The bath tub has a silver finish on the outside adding luster and elegance[/caption]

For more picture of this project, click <a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Westview_Manor.html">HERE </a>to check out our website!


&nbsp;]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Project House-Float commences tomorrow!</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/04/project-house-float-commences-tomorrow/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 05 Sep 2013 05:13:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1632</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Our project <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/underway/English_Country_Estate.html">English Country Estate</a> begins demolition tomorrow, and this is not your average demo.

<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-housemove.png"><img class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-1633" alt="Gelotte-Hommas-housemove" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-housemove.png" width="350" height="274" />

</a>The clients came to us wanting to build a gorgeous new English Estate, but they wanted to salvage the existing home by moving it to their property in the San Juan Islands. Starting tomorrow the existing home will be cut into three pieces, cranes onto a barge, and then floated all the way up to the San Juan's where the home will be put back together.

[caption id="attachment_1634" align="aligncenter" width="560"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/img_8929.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1634" alt="IMG_8929" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/img_8929.jpg" width="560" height="420" /></a> The existing home that is being moved tomorrow[/caption]

Once the demo is complete we will begin construction on this gorgeous 8,000 sq ft. English country Estate.

[caption id="attachment_1635" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/large_3.png"><img class="size-full wp-image-1635" alt="large_3" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/large_3.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Extensive rock work and lush gardens are in store for our waterfront client[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1636" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/large_7.png"><img class="size-full wp-image-1636" alt="large_7" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/large_7.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> The English Countryside right in the heart of Bellevue[/caption]

Check back tomorrow on our <a href="https://www.facebook.com/GHarchitecture">facebook page</a> for live coverage of the move!
<p style="text-align:center;"></p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The 6 Key Considerations for Architectural Design</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/06/the-6-key-considerations-for-architectural-design/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 06 Sep 2013 14:54:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1642</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">As an award-winning Seattle architect, here at <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>, we know there are important elements of design that need to be taken into consideration when helping you achieve your dream project, whether it’s a large commercial space, or a the home of your dreams.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1648" align="alignright" width="288"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Fallen_Maples.html"><img class=" wp-image-1648  " alt="The 6 Key Considerations for Architectural Design" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte_hommas_portfolio_projects.png" width="288" height="223" /></a> Keep these tips in mind when designing your dream home. Source: <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Fallen_Maples.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">There are <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">six crucial elements</a> when developing a space for commercial or residential use:</p>

<ol style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Place - This element is not just about your literal location, but how the interior relates to the exterior, and how your space will help you find comfort as well as dominion.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Form - The way a building comes together isn't just about outside and inside. It is also about the beauty found in articulating a functional structure.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Rhythm - All spaces have a rhythm — a flow and interconnection of how the spaces interact and are separate from one another.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Light - The light in a space matters around the clock. Lighting can help create a mood for each room, and the entire structure of the building. External lighting can also contribute to the mood and feel of a space outdoors.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Materials - In order to make a space as artful as it is functional, the right materials must be selected. With the proper materials, a space is transformed and will bring the other elements into focus.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Beauty - These five preceding elements all contribute to the beauty of the space, but the overall line-up, scale, and proportion contribute to the aesthetics of a dream space as well.</li>
</ol>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Choosing an <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">award-winning Seattle architect</a> is the first step to making your brainchild into a reality. More importantly, considering these six design elements will help you build upon your ideas and make them work, no matter where or what you’re creating.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>How Natural Light in the Home Can Affect Your Health</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/06/how-natural-light-in-the-home-can-affect-your-health/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 06 Sep 2013 21:54:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1644</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1653" align="alignleft" width="300"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Casa_Del_Sol.html"><img class=" wp-image-1653 " alt="How Natural Light in the Home Can Affect Your Health" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/casa-del-sol-gelotte-hommas-seattle-wa.jpg" width="300" height="232" /></a> Improving the lighting at home can improve more than household aesthetics. Source: <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Casa_Del_Sol.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>[/caption]

Whether designing a new home or remodeling an existing dwelling, <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Contact.html" target="_blank">adding natural light</a> to the home is a key benefit affecting your health as well as that of your family. Studies have shown that an abundance of natural light has a positive affect on our attitude and well-being.

With the aid of a professional firm such as <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Firm.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>, enhancing the natural light to your home is an attainable option, from skylights and extra-large windows to French doors and glass-walled rooms.

Studies indicate that are many benefits to natural lighting. Students studying in a naturally lit room tend to be more focused versus studying under fluorescent lighting. A home office with non-glare windows, allowing sunlight and scenic beauty to filter through the windows, increases productivity. Plus, natural sunlight is nature's way of providing vitamin D.

Minimizing fluorescent lighting in the kitchen and bathroom by replacing it with natural light has the added effect of keeping your body in tune with its internal clock. With our <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Portfolio.html" target="_blank">expert design services</a> at Gelotte Hommas, we can easily address alternate ways to enhance natural lighting.

A home with ample natural lighting projects a positive atmosphere for homeowners. To continue keeping the internal clock in tune, adding natural light to the home, especially bedrooms, emphasizes the all-powerful morning sun by using windows, glass doors or skylights.

Furniture position is also a factor when designing or redesigning a home. Gelotte Hommas can design the floor plan to emphasize optimum placement enforcing the health benefits of sunlight.

Studies have also shown that a family dining in a room with plenty of sunlight tend to eat less or in moderation versus those dining in a closed room with lamps or fluorescent lighting.

Gelotte Hommas has served its clients with exceptional service, professionalism, insight, creativity and <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Contact.html" target="_blank">outstanding communication</a> to ensure satisfaction for over twenty-five years. Call on this award-winning Seattle architect to improve the natural lighting in your home or future project.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Keep These Points in Mind for Your Outdoor Kitchen</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/11/keep-these-points-in-mind-for-your-outdoor-kitchen/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 11 Sep 2013 10:00:28 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1646</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1656" align="alignright" width="320"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Glassworks_remodel.html"><img class=" wp-image-1656 " alt="Keep These Points in Mind for Your Outdoor Kitchen" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/glassworks-remodel-patio.png" width="320" height="248" /></a> Call on Gelotte Hommas to assist in designing an outdoor kitchen.[/caption]

Adding an outdoor kitchen to your home is an enhancement on several levels. An outdoor kitchen provides the opportunity for families to get together for cookouts. For party enthusiasts, an outdoor kitchen is the perfect place to host an event. On a real estate level, adding this feature increases the dollar value of the home.

With the help of our expert services at <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Portfolio.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>, our professional staff can design an outdoor kitchen that will add to your home's appeal and atmosphere.

When planning for the addition of an outdoor kitchen, our architects listen to what you want in your kitchen design. There are several things to consider for this feature and our staff will guide you all the way. Consider these tips when <a href="http://www.bhg.com/kitchen/outdoor/outdoor-kitchens/#page=1" target="_blank">planning your outdoor kitchen</a>.
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Materials must be resilient to withstand the many seasonal elements, from the sizzling highs to freezing lows.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The kitchen area needs to be as fully equipped as your indoor kitchen. Allow for plenty of storage space for basic items such as napkins, utensils, cleansers and trash bins.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Plan for nighttime cooking with lighting specifically made for outdoor use.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If there's an overhead ceiling in the cooking area, install a ceiling fan to keep the area cool when cooking and eating.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Use flooring made of easy to clean material.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Allow for the installation of additional electrical outlets.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Your outdoor kitchen design should include an overhead to protect guests from sun, wind or rain. Our architects can incorporate a full or partial roof or any creative idea you may have in mind.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Include the installation of a small sink and water source to make your outdoor kitchen completely versatile.</li>
</ul>
With over twenty-five years of expert design services, <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Contact.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a> has turned client's dreams into visual realities.]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>GHA Names Eric Drivdahl as Principal</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/12/gha-names-eric-drivdahl-as-principal/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 Sep 2013 19:45:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1669</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<b>GELOTTE HOMMAS ARCHITECTURE BRINGS ON ERIC DRIVDAHL AS PRINCIPAL </b>

<b>Seattle, WA – Sept. 12, 2013 — </b>GELOTTE HOMMAS ARCHITECTURE, a nationally recognized custom residential architecture firm based in Bellevue, has brought Eric Drivdahl on as the third Principal of the firm. The announcement was made by the two owners, and Principals of the firm Curtis Gelotte and Scott Hommas. Eric took on his new role at the beginning of September. Drivdahl has worked with GHA for the last twelve years working as the firms Senior Project Manager. Eric developed and leads the firm’s in-house professional development program, which trains staff on design, project management, architectural science, professionalism, and sales and marketing endeavors. Eric specializes in heading up design teams on highly sophisticated luxury home projects with one-of-a-kind features.

Drivdahl is a graduate of Washington State University with a Bachelor of Science in Architectural Studies and a Bachelor of Architecture.

[caption id="attachment_1670" align="aligncenter" width="269"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-2.jpg"><img class=" wp-image-1670" alt="Eric Drivdahl, Principal" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-2.jpg" width="269" height="404" /></a> Eric Drivdahl named third Principal at Gelotte Hommas Architecture[/caption]

“We are grateful for Eric’s contributions to the office over the last twelve years and very excited about the future, long-term contributions Eric will make as a principal and leader at Gelotte Hommas Architects.” Says Hommas.

“Curt and Scott lead Gelotte Hommas Architecture with such passion for design and commitment to outstanding service,” Drivdahl comments.  “  I am thrilled to join the leadership team and increase our ability to deliver outstanding projects with creative design solutions with a client focused attitude.  I find a ridiculous joy in providing these things.”

About GELOTTE HOMMAS ARCHITECTURE:

Gelotte Hommas Architecture, based in Bellevue, Washington, was established by Senior Principal Curtis Gelotte in 1981 and joined by co-owner Scott Hommas in 1997. The highly acclaimed, nationally recognized residential architecture firm accredits its substantial success to overall dedication to design and client satisfaction. The Art of Architecture is more than just their tagline, it’s the foundation.
For more information, visit Gelotte Hommas Architecture online at <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com">www.gelottehommas.com
</a>Find us online at

<a href="https://www.facebook.com/GHarchitecture"><img class=" wp-image-1671 alignnone" alt="facebook" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/facebook.jpg" width="28" height="28" /></a>

<a href="http://instagram.com/gelottehommas#"><img class=" wp-image-1672 alignnone" alt="@gelottehommas" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/instagram.jpg" width="26" height="26" /></a>

<a href="http://www.linkedin.com/company/gelotte-hommas-architecture"><img class=" wp-image-1673 alignnone" alt="linked in" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/linked-in.jpg" width="24" height="24" /></a>

<a href="https://twitter.com/GelotteHommas"><img class=" wp-image-1674 alignnone" alt="twitter" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/twitter.jpg" width="23" height="23" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>How to Pick the Right Architect for Your Project</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/16/how-to-pick-the-right-architect-for-your-project/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 16 Sep 2013 17:00:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1638</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1666" align="alignright" width="343"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/underway/Rustic_Ridge.html"><img class=" wp-image-1666 " alt="How to Pick the Right Architect for Your Project" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-floor-plan.png" width="343" height="266" /></a> From start to finish, a professional architect should act as a planner and guide for your dream project.[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When it comes to building your dreams and turning them into a reality, how to choose the right architect can play a pivotal role in the process. Regardless of your project’s budget, you need someone who you can trust to help turn your ideas into something solid and true.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Here are a few <a href="http://www.aia.org/value/yaya/AIAS076558" target="_blank">important considerations when selecting your architect</a>:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Interview your selections thoroughly, including <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Portfolio.html" target="_blank">examining their portfolios</a>, to see how compatible their work is with what you have in mind for your ideas.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Look through a potential architect's body of work to ensure that their style matches your preferences and needs.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When making your decision, balance out cost with other considerations. Avoid making everything about your budget, keeping in mind that, in most cases, ‘you get what you pay for.’ Take the time to measure compatibility with your architect, as well as the firm’s professionalism, their abilities in design, and their technical prowess.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Ask about how they will approach your project, including bringing in consultants, how much human power it will take to make it a reality, and what their process is in turning your dreams into a reality.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Most importantly, keep in mind that this is your brainchild, and it should work for you - choose your architect accordingly.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Knowing how to choose the right architect for your project can be a lifesaver for getting exactly what you want for your ideas. Whether you’re building a dream home to a dream business, make sure you’re getting exactly what you want.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Image via Gelotte Hommas</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Designing the Perfect Open Floor Plan for Your Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/25/designing-the-perfect-open-floor-plan-for-your-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 25 Sep 2013 17:00:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1640</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">One of the hottest trends in home design right now are open floor plan designs, and it’s easy to see why they’re so popular. This trend really creates a dynamic space for entertaining, is super efficient for living, and can be the best flow for movement around the house.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1699" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Hilltop.html"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1699" alt="Designing the Perfect Open Floor Plan for Your Home" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/hilltop-clyde-hill-wa-gelotte-hommas.png?w=300" width="300" height="232" /></a> Open floor plans can create a seamless appeal in a home. Source: <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Hilltop.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When you’re thinking of creating an open floor plan for your home, no matter what size your project is, there are a few <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/1174159/list/Good-Spaces--Mastering-the-Open-Floor-Plan" target="_blank">key considerations to space planning</a> that will help you along with your design:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Consider getting from one area of the home to another. Traffic flow matters with the open space just as it does the closed one. You will need to allow at least three feet of space for your travel patterns.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Group your furniture ahead of time. Decide not only which pieces of furniture go together, but the negative space (the space in between your groupings) and traffic flow space between them. If you can see how the living area is separated from the dining area by furniture grouping, you can see how you can have ‘rooms’ in an open space.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Choose which spaces will be private, semi-private, and open. This is important when it comes to design. For example, a closed-off dining room makes for more formal entertaining.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Decide on how your spaces will flow, and what areas will be adjacent to one another. Depending on your lifestyle, you may wish to have the dining area separated from the living area by a workspace, entertainment or play area, etc.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When looking into the elements for open floor plan designs, consider these tips for choosing the <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">ideal design elements</a> in your living space. Doing so can help you create the space you want and need that works best for your style of living.</p>
For more information on award winning architects in Seattle, feel free to contact the <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architects</a>.]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

			<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[The Benefits of Having an Open Floor Plan | Gelotte Hommas Architecture Blog]]></wp:comment_author>
			<wp:comment_author_email></wp:comment_author_email>
			<wp:comment_author_url>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/19/the-benefits-of-having-an-open-floor-plan/</wp:comment_author_url>
			<wp:comment_author_IP>192.0.80.183</wp:comment_author_IP>
			<wp:comment_date>2014-03-19 12:45:34</wp:comment_date>
			<wp:comment_date_gmt>2014-03-19 19:45:34</wp:comment_date_gmt>
			<wp:comment_content><![CDATA[[&#8230;] Open floor plan designs in homes and apartments have been around for a long time. However, in 2014, they’re particularly popular, and that popularity doesn’t seem like it’s going to fade anytime soon. That’s because open floor plan designs have a wide variety of benefits for homeowners and renters – ones that make day to day life much more enjoyable for many people, as opposed to more traditional closed floor plans. [&#8230;]]]></wp:comment_content>

	<item>
		<title>The Benefits and Disadvantages of Granite Kitchen Countertops</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/20/the-benefits-and-disadvantages-of-granite-kitchen-countertops/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 20 Sep 2013 17:00:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1659</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1692" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Yarrow_Point.html"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1692" alt="The Benefits and Disadvantages of Granite Kitchen Countertops" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/kitchen-yarrow-point.png?w=300" width="300" height="226" /></a> Weigh these pros and cons before installing new granite countertops at home. Source: <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Yarrow_Point.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>[/caption]<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The kitchen is, in many cases, the vital life-center of a home. Many people enjoy cooking and want to explore cuisine as thoroughly as possible. A popular trend in gourmet kitchens is to have a granite kitchen countertop theme. If you’re trying to decide on whether or not granite is right for you, here are a few advantages and drawbacks that might help you come to a decision:</p><ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Granite is extremely sanitary, and it's a far cleaner surface than tile, as bacteria can breed like mad in the grouting of tile.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Granite is heat-resistant. If you place a hot pan on it, it won’t leave a burn mark or crack the surface.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you like to renovate and change your household often, granite does not come up easily, and it is considered an extremely long-term commitment.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Perfect for customization, granite will give your kitchen a unique look that no other homeowner will have, because all granite slabs differ from one another. However, this is also a simultaneous drawback, as creating a look that is uniform throughout the kitchen can be difficult.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Granite doesn't crack easily, but it can if a very heavy object is dropped on it, such as a large and full saucepan.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Cleaning granite is extremely simple, with a non-abrasive cleanser, such as dish soap. Soap, water, and a soft cloth are all you need to keep it clean.</li><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The value of granite never depreciates, it is a wise investment for homeowners.</li></ul><p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you’re considering a granite kitchen countertop for your cooking space, <a href="http://www.remodelpros.com/articles/countertops/granite-countertops-pros-and-cons.html" target="_blank">use this list</a> to help you decide if the pros outweigh the cons for your cooking and life-style. And make sure you contact <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architects</a> for all your architecture needs in and around the Northwest.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The Advantages of Automating Your New Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/27/the-advantages-of-automating-your-new-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 27 Sep 2013 10:00:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1661</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1701" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://www.morguefile.com/archive/display/200133"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1701" alt="The Advantages of Automating Your New Home" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/remote-control.jpg?w=300" width="300" height="199" /></a> Automating a home is possible with proper planning and direction. Source: <a href="http://www.morguefile.com/archive/display/200133" target="_blank">morgueFile</a>[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">customizing and building a new home</a>, there are plenty of options for adding to your peace of mind. One of those things is home automation. In our electronic age, there are many added conveniences, and adding automation to your home is a big one.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">There are several advantages to making your home automated:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Security measures are much easier in an automated home. You can set up security cameras in and around the house, and set them to motion sensitivity, or program them to record at certain times throughout the night or day. This can help you keep track of your house and add a secure feeling for the whole family.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">You can save electricity and protect your home from fire by having the ability to shut off small appliances and lights with the touch of a button from your mobile phone, and never have to worry about having left the coffee maker on ever again.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you've ever forgotten to raise or lower your thermostat before leaving for the day, you know what it’s like to come home to a sauna or refrigerator. You can prevent this through automation in the house by programming through your cell phone. Then, you can adjust the temperature accordingly, and a few hours before you go home for the day, you can raise or lower the thermostat and come in to a comfortable house.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you’re in the midst of customizing your new place, consider home automation as <a href="http://freshome.com/2013/01/17/top-10-benefits-of-automating-your-home/" target="_blank">one of those added benefits</a>. Increase your peace of mind and make your life a lot easier by giving a <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Seattle architect firm</a> a call.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Open Your Bathroom Up with a Curbless Shower</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/18/open-your-bathroom-up-with-a-curbless-shower/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 18 Sep 2013 10:00:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1663</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1697" align="alignright" width="238"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/lakeside_lookout.html"><img class=" wp-image-1697 " alt="Open up your bathroom with a curbless shower packed with eye-catching aesthetics. " src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/curbless-shower_lakeside_lookout_gelotte_hommas.png?w=264" width="238" height="270" /></a> Open up your bathroom with a curbless shower packed with eye-catching aesthetics.[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">One of the recent trends in customizing homes is having an open shower design in the bathroom. Whether it’s the master bath or otherwise (or all of them), this addition can be an attractive and streamlined look for your home. <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/193553/list/The-Case-for-a-Curbless-Shower" target="_blank">Curbless showers</a> make an interesting and appealing aesthetic choice.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Here are a few items to consider when choosing whether or not to design your bath with a curbless shower:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Space requirements are typically much larger than a curbed shower in order to contain the splash zone. This can be mitigated with proper showerhead placement, but the size of the bathroom will have to be larger to accommodate, just the same.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Drainage needs will require a sloping floor in some cases, to ensure proper water flow to the drain, so that the room is completely dry after use.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When considering drains, think about how they will fit into the room, and what kind of materials you would want in order to create an attractive shower system.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If a totally open shower doesn’t seem like a good fit for your needs and preferences, there are curbless showers that are enclosed behind glass, which will retain the streamlined appearance.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">With a curbless shower, exterior walls can be designed in such a way to make your bath/shower experience seem like a step into nature, or give you the secure feeling of total privacy, but without the claustrophobic, cramped feel of a curbed shower.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When you’re considering a <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">customized new home</a>, keep an open shower design in mind for the bathroom, and contact an <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">award-winning Seattle architecture firm</a>, Gelotte Hommas Architects.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Image via <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/lakeside_lookout.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas </a></p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>How to float a house through the Ballard Locks</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/12/how-to-float-a-house-through-the-ballard-locks/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 12 Sep 2013 19:15:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1679</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Our project English Country Estate commenced on Monday by removing the existing house and floating it up to the San Juans via barge. That's roughly a 100 nautical miles or so from where it started.
The process went smoothly, and everyone had a really fun time watching the feat of engineering take place.

[caption id="attachment_1682" align="aligncenter" width="560"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-156.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1682" alt="McDonald House Move 156" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-156.jpg" width="560" height="372" /></a> They began by hoisting the house over 8 feet up onto the apparatus that would move it down the hill onto the barge[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1683" align="aligncenter" width="336"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-296.jpg"><img class=" wp-image-1683" alt="McDonald House Move 296" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-296.jpg" width="336" height="505" /></a> Left side of the house[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1684" align="aligncenter" width="336"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-302.jpg"><img class=" wp-image-1684" alt="McDonald House Move 302" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-302.jpg" width="336" height="223" /></a> The home moving through two trees on the property. Quiet the snug fit![/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1685" align="aligncenter" width="336"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-309.jpg"><img class="wp-image-1685 " alt="McDonald House Move 309" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-309.jpg" width="336" height="223" /></a> The right side of the house.[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1686" align="aligncenter" width="560"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-373.jpg"><img class="size-full wp-image-1686" alt="McDonald House Move 373" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/mcdonald-house-move-373.jpg" width="560" height="372" /></a> Down the hill, onto the barge, and out to Sea![/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1680" align="aligncenter" width="300"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/photo_through_locks.jpg"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1680" alt="photo_through_locks" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/photo_through_locks.jpg?w=300" width="300" height="224" /></a> Seeing a house move through the locks is awe-inspiring.[/caption]

[caption id="attachment_1681" align="aligncenter" width="300"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/dsc_0552.jpg"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1681" alt="DSC_0552" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/dsc_0552.jpg?w=300" width="300" height="199" /></a> Big House - Little Tug Boat.[/caption]
<p style="text-align:center;">To see what is replacing this house, and for project update please visit our the project on our website <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/underway/English_Country_Estate.html">English Country Estate .</a></p>
<p style="text-align:center;"></p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The Baker&#039;s Kitchen: Design Your Home Around Your Passions</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/07/the-bakers-kitchen-design-your-home-around-your-passions/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 07 Oct 2013 10:00:06 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1704</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you have a passion for baking, you deserve a kitchen that can accommodate your talents and passion. The rich aroma of baked goods in the kitchen is, for many, steeped in nostalgia of good times, and it always uplifts feelings throughout the house. Whether you just dabble in cupcakes for the weekend, or make specialty cakes, pies, and puff pastries, you need <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/14113997/" target="_blank">a kitchen designed to reflect this</a>.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1711" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Coastal_Cove_house.html"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1711" alt="The Baker's Kitchen: Design Your Home Around Your Passions" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-coastal-cove-house-washington-state.png?w=300" width="300" height="232" /></a> Source: <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Coastal_Cove_house.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">There are several kitchen design basics to have for baking, to make the process more convenient:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Keep shelves open for easy grabbing of ingredients. Things like flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder, and other dry ingredients should be accessible with ease.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Baking pans and trays are ideally stored upright for simple viewing and access for just the size you need for your next cooking project. Make sure your cabinets are designed to hold trays and pans upright.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Of course, for any good cook or baker, easy visibility and access is key. Roll-out drawers that will hold cookie cutters, measuring cups and spoons, and the like are an ideal solution.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you have a favorite cooking show or want to access an online how-to video, it’s more difficult having to leave the room to watch it and then head back to the kitchen to cook. Instead, make a section of your kitchen the technology nook, and get the design to accommodate a built-in desk, chair, and wires for television and laptops.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Remember, when it comes to designing your home, your loves and passions come first as <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">the foundation of your design</a>. Enjoy your passion for baking with a baker’s kitchen design, specifically tailored to your needs and wants. Bon appetit!</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>

	<item>
		<title>Why You Should Consider a Green Roof</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/02/why-you-should-consider-a-green-roof/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 02 Oct 2013 10:00:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1706</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1709" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Hilltop.html"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1709" alt="Why You Should Consider a Green Roof" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/09/gelotte-hommas-hilltop-clyde-hill-wa.png?w=300" width="300" height="232" /></a> A green roof can keep a home eco-friendly while bringing a new sense of style and comfort.[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Part of the practicality of green architectural design is in its sustainability, as well as its durability. When considering a home that has fewer environmental impacts, consider using a green roof in your home's design. There are many benefits to <a href="http://www.thedailygreen.com/green-homes/latest/green-roofs#slide-1" target="_blank">adding a green roof</a> to your home.</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The green roof is versatile and can be customized for a home’s particular needs. Depending upon what you would like to grow on your roof, you can choose an extensive or intensive design. Extensive (less than 6” depth) tends to be lighter weight and less maintenance effort, and intensive (greater than 6” depth) is heavier and takes more effort to maintain. However, the plant diversity is greater with an intensive green roof.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">With this style of design, heating and cooling the home becomes much easier. Heating in the winter and cooling in the summer is a lot more convenient, given the protective insulation the green roof provides.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A major benefit of the green roof is that it decreases storm water runoff, which is a concern for areas that get flooded on a regular basis (or even an occasional basis). Erosion damage is reduced greatly, as well.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Oftentimes, green roofs can provide a habitat for wildlife. This can make for an extraordinary home experience or a delight for the commercial experience.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Green roofs provide a solution for sustainable urban agriculture, and it can reduce the dependency upon trucking supplies and, therefore, supply interruptions.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you’re considering <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/">green </a><a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">architectural design</a> for your home or commercial project, consider the addition of a green roof as a part of it. With the many benefits of this additional green space, it’s often an ideal, practical, and beneficial addition to any green home.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Image via <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Hilltop.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architecture </a></p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Creative Ways to Add Accent Colors in the Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/25/creative-ways-to-add-accent-colors-in-the-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 25 Oct 2013 20:10:30 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1714</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/gelottehommas.png"><img class="alignright size-medium wp-image-1716" alt="Gelotte hommas colorful bedroom" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/gelottehommas.png?w=300" width="300" height="233" /></a>Whether you've been in your home for years or are just starting out, taking the plunge into a fresh color scheme can be a bit intimidating. But it certainly doesn't have to be when you have a game-plan and a few extra bucks in your pocket. Use some of these ideas to bring color into your home with these easy ways to add accent color.

<b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Choose your <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2012/10/05/friday-fun-our-most-popular-fall-paint-palettes/">color scheme</a>:</b> Choosing a color scheme that works well in your home is easier than you might think - just leave the paint swatch isle for a few days. Seriously. Instead, spend this time looking at your things -- accessories, wall art or rugs, for example, and choose your scheme from there. This will not only save you hours in the paint isle, but will help pull your room together by incorporating like colors throughout it.

<b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Paint something - or don't:</b> Yes, paint is a great way to add color to a room and can be done fairly easily and quickly, but it isn't the only option. You can also add color to your room with the use of throw pillows or a complementary piece of furniture which falls into your color scheme. Still itching to paint? Try painting a window frame only, or give accessories or lighting a face-lift by painting those.

<b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Treat your windows</b>: Curtains or other window coverings are a great way to add a splash of color to any room for relatively cheap, and can even help save on <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/tag/eco-friendly-architecture/">energy costs</a>, too! Best of all, you can switch out your curtains as the seasons change giving your home fresh color year-round.

There are many easy ways to add accent color to your home including these ideas from <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/17708504/list/8-High-Impact-Places-for-Accent-Colors/">Houzz.com</a>. For more great home design advice, contact <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/">Gelotte Hommas</a> today!]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Green Home Improvements: Saving the Planet Can Save You Cash</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/29/green-home-improvements-saving-the-planet-can-save-you-cash/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 29 Oct 2013 20:50:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1722</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[[caption id="attachment_1726" align="alignright" width="300"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/house-under-construction.jpg"><img class="size-medium wp-image-1726" alt="house under construction" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/house-under-construction.jpg?w=300" width="300" height="300" /></a> Source: shutterstock.com[/caption]
<p class="Paragraph SCX30276393" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Don't let the higher price tags of energy-efficient appliances and home renovations keep you from conserving energy this winter. Thanks to appealing government incentive programs, <a class="Hyperlink SCX30276393" href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2011/09/09/green-design-the-longevity-of-your-home/" target="_blank">going green</a> can be very affordable, and will save you some major green in the long-run too. Here are just a few ways you can make green home improvements with government assistance.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX30276393" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Appliances: </b>Many high-efficiency appliances such as water heaters and furnaces qualify for tax credits of up to ten percent of the purchase price. Also known as the Consumer Tax Credit, this government incentive program can save consumers up to $500 until December, 2013 just by switching to eco-friendly appliances. Even if your older appliances still function well, replacing them may be of benefit, considering the higher energy standards associated with new, energy-efficient models.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX30276393" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Home renovations</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">:</b> Another Consumer Tax Incentive is credited to home owners and builders who make <a class="Hyperlink SCX30276393" href="https://www.smud.org/en/residential/save-energy/learn-energy-efficiency/energy-efficient-remodeling.htm" target="_blank">energy-efficient renovations</a> to a property, namely the building's outer envelope. Capped at $500, these tax credits can help reduce renovation costs if you install EnergyStar-certified windows and doors, or increase your home's SEER value through additional insulation.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX30276393" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Renewable energy systems:</b> On-site energy systems like photovoltaic (solar) panels will definitely bring the most value back to you through incentive programs, though their initial cost is typically higher. Fortunately, that hearty price can be off-set by as much as a 30 percent tax credit for qualifying energy systems.</p>
There are many ways you can make green home improvements without having to break the bank. With a little research and selective purchasing, going green has never been more affordable.

Gelotte Hommas Architecture specializes in eco-friendly design, because we know that the art in architecture cannot surpass the artistic talents of Mother Nature. To learn more, <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">contact us</a> at <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> today.]]></content:encoded>

		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>green-home-improvements-saving-the-planet-can-save-you-cash</wp:post_name>

	<item>
		<title>Keys to Decorating a New Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/31/keys-to-decorating-a-new-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Oct 2013 11:30:01 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1720</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="Paragraph SCX225844790" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);text-align:center;"><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/gelotte-hommas-architecture-living-room-and-kitchendining.png"><img class="size-full wp-image-1728 aligncenter" title="Gelotte Hommas Architecture -  Living room and Kitchen:dining" alt="Gelotte Hommas Architecture -  Living room and Kitchen:dining" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/gelotte-hommas-architecture-living-room-and-kitchendining.png" width="490" height="380" /></a>If you're moving to a new place, you've obviously got a lot of things on your to-do list, and we understand that decorating a new home may be last thing on the list. But taking time now to plan your new home's layout will make the decorating process much easier.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX225844790" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">To make<a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/17899330/list/How-to-Decorate-When-You-re-Starting-Out-or-Starting-Over/" target="_blank"> decorating a new home</a> as easy as possible, we've outlined some of what we feel are the most important steps in the process, courtesy of Houzz.com.</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Plan your layout</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">:</b> Furniture is heavy, but newspaper or cardboard cut-outs are not. Use them to plan where your furniture will go prior to moving in, or create a virtual floor plan online so that all of your heaviest things can move straight to their new locations without a lot of shuffling around. Trust us - your back will thank you.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Make a budget</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">:</b> If you're up-sizing, it's easy to get carried away with new furniture and accessories, but a "get it now, pay for it later" approach could leave you paying off your purchases well after their prime. Instead, tackle each room individually by <a class="Hyperlink SCX225844790" href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/Budget-Decorating">following a budget</a> and using home-made or second-hand accessories when possible.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Show your colors</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">:</b> Off-white walls are a safe way to sell a property, but too much of it can leave you feeling bored. Kick things up by adding color to your home through the use of colorful accents, rugs or window coverings. Use our <a class="Hyperlink SCX225844790" href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2012/10/05/friday-fun-our-most-popular-fall-paint-palettes/">Autumn-inspired color palette</a> to help you decide what colors work best for you.</li>
</ul>
<p class="Paragraph SCX225844790" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Many emotions accompany the move to a new place; from excitement and anticipation to fear and panic. But you can help make the transition smooth and enjoyable by planning for it in advance, including plans to decorate.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX225844790" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Do you have questions about decorating a new space? <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> today at Gelotte Hommas Architects.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Together let&#039;s change the face of men&#039;s health!</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/30/together-lets-change-the-face-of-mens-health/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Oct 2013 02:18:04 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1731</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p>This year GHA is participating in Movember and the guys in our office have BRAVELY volunteered their faces for 30 days to help change the face of men’s health.</p>[caption id="attachment_1736" align="aligncenter" width="728"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/movember.jpg"><img class=" wp-image-1736 " alt="Gelotte Hommas Architecture raising awareness of men's health" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/movember.jpg" width="728" height="546" /></a> Let's make Men's Health Center Stage this MOVEMBER[/caption]<p>Every participant is committing to no shaving for 30 DAYS and in the process donating $1 for every day they grow their mustache/beard bigger.<br /> At the end of the 30 days all the money raised goes directly towards prostate cancer research.<br /> Here are GHA beards on day 1:<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/tom.jpg"><br /> </a></p><table class=" aligncenter"><tbody><tr><td><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1739" alt="Scott Tholen, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/scott_t.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></td><td><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1732" alt="Brent Huntley, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/brent.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></td><td><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1742" alt="Zack Spencer, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/zack.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></td></tr><tr><td><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1733" alt="Curtis Gelotte, Principal at GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/curt.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></td><td><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1734" alt="David Grubb, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/david.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></td><td><a style="font-family:'Open Sans', sans-serif;font-size:13px;line-height:19px;" href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/eric.jpg"><img class="alignright size-full wp-image-1735" alt="Eric Drivdahl, Principal at GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/eric.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/tom.jpg"><img alt="Tom Brown, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/tom.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></td><td><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/robert.jpg"><img alt="Robert Laney, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/robert.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></td><td><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/seppi.jpg"><img alt="Seppi Hutter, part of GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/seppi.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></td></tr><tr><td><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/scott_h.jpg"><img class="aligncenter" alt="Scott Hommas, Principal at GHA, supporting Movember" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/scott_h.jpg" width="300" height="300" /></a></td></tr></tbody></table><h1><span style="color:#333333;"><strong>GET INVOLVED!</strong> There are two ways:</span></h1><p>1)      Sponsor a GHA beard and match whatever your guy raises at the end of the 30 days</p><p>2)      Contribute directly to the donation pot now – you don’t have to wait until the end!</p><p>Stay up to date on our facebook page by clicking <a href="https://www.facebook.com/GHarchitecture/media_set?set=a.563849783663797&amp;type=1">HERE</a>. We will be posting weekly picture updates on facebook of the GHA beards.</p><p>So get involved and let’s change the face of men’s health!<br /> Happy Growing everyone!</p>]]></content:encoded>

		<title>Kirkland House</title>

	<item>
		<title>How to Pick the Right Light Fixtures for Your Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/11/04/how-to-pick-the-right-light-fixtures-for-your-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 04 Nov 2013 20:34:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1718</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p class="Paragraph SCX171099543" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A home without good lighting loses it's beauty as soon as the sun sets, but a home with great lighting never skips a beat. Give your home the shining personality it deserves with the right lighting. To choose the right lighting for your home, consider the following:</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/24481/Basin-Ledge-Residence-contemporary-living-room-austin" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="picking the right lighting" alt="picking the right lighting" src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/e4318bf00a310c01_8-0538/contemporary-living-room.jpg" width="500" height="334" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small><a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/contemporary/living-room">Contemporary Living Room</a> by <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/professionals/architect/c/Austin--TX">Austin Architects &amp; Designers</a> <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/pro/dickclark/dick-clark-associates">Dick Clark + Associates</a> via Houzz</small></div>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Style:</b> It's important to remember to incorporate your light fixtures into the rest of your design scheme, and choosing the right style is key to doing so. Is your home's architecture modern with smooth, flowing lines and curves, or is it more traditional featuring simple roof-lines and symmetric design? Whatever the <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2011/12/14/different-details-in-contemporary-modern-architecture/">architecture of your home</a>, choose lighting fixtures to match.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Shape and size:</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> </b>Careful consideration needs to be given to the shape and size of lighting fixtures, so your rooms don't appear awkward or disproportionate. You might choose pendant lights for rooms with elevated ceilings, but table lamps for more intimate rooms.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2011/09/23/functional-architecture-the-beauty-and-the-brawn/">Function</a>:</b><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> </b>The purpose of the room should play a major part in your lighting choices. For example, you would probably not need strong or harsh lighting in your dining room, but you might like to have the choice for strong lighting in your kitchen or craft room.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="color:#0d0e00;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Color:</b> Lastly, consider your color scheme when choosing light fixtures. Can you paint your light fixture to match your rug or find a lamp shade that accents the color of your wall-art? Matching your lighting with your color scheme will give your room a seamless appearance.</li>
</ul>
<p class="Paragraph SCX171099543" style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The right lighting not only improves a home's physical appeal, but can actually increase both the optimism and productivity of its inhabitants.</p>
<p class="Paragraph SCX171099543" style="color:windowtext;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Learn more about choosing light fixtures for your home by <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">contacting us</a> at <a class="Hyperlink SCX171099543" href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> today.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Creative Bedside Lighting Ideas</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/11/10/creative-bedside-lighting-ideas/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 11 Nov 2013 00:34:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1724</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Nothing rounds off the look of a room like <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/06/how-natural-light-in-the-home-can-affect-your-health/" target="_blank">good lighting</a>, and your master bedroom is certainly no different. Choose the best lighting for your bedroom by incorporating style and function. Here are a few bedroom lighting ideas to help shed light on the subject.</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/140872/Contemporary-Bedroom-contemporary-bedroom-tampa" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="custom lighting in Seattle " alt="custom lighting in Seattle " src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/0cd1befc0d76ed4a_8-1512/contemporary-bedroom.jpg" width="500" height="324" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small>Tampa <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/contemporary/bedroom">Contemporary Bedroom</a> by Interiors by Studiom via Houzz</small></div>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Get it off the table:</b> Table lamps are a common accessory to any bedroom and for good reason: it's much easier to relax with a good book in bed if you don't have to get up to shut off the light afterwards. But, table lamps are certainly not the only option for this. Consider an updated look by using sconce lighting to serve the same purpose while freeing up valuable space on your nightstand.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Hang your lighting:</b> If you're feeling a little reluctant to put permanent light fixtures in your walls, then think about going at it from a different angle: your ceiling. Pendant lights are an elegant way to accent tall rooms. They come in a variety of styles to match your décor and can be switched out relatively easily should you choose a different design later.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Add dimmer switches:</b> Recessed lighting and dimmer switches are great way to add varying amounts of light to your room. Whether you need bright lighting to work or low lighting to relax, dimmers can solve your bedroom lighting problem with the simple turn of a knob.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Your master bedroom should be both inviting and relaxing; your ultimate retreat after a long day's work. Reduce stress in your life by incorporating these bedroom lighting ideas.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">For more great ways to design your home, <a href="http://gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">speak with us</a> at Gelotte Hommas Architecture, where we see the art in architecture and want to share it with you.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Kirkland Farmhouse: great design that&#039;s budget savy</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/10/31/kirkland-farmhouse-great-design-thats-budget-savy/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 31 Oct 2013 18:56:49 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://blog.gelottehommas.com/?p=1745</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[Our project KIRKLAND FARMHOUSE recently finished. This gorgeous traditional style project is a beautiful example of good design on a budget.
<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/a_kirk_1.jpg"><img alt="Traditional architecture on a budget" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/a_kirk_1.jpg" width="490" height="327" /></a>
<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/a_kirk_1.jpg">
</a><a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/c_kirk_3.jpg">
</a>These clients came to us a little apprehensive that we could design them a custom dream home on a budget. Our reply, to their delight, was of course we can!
<img class="size-full wp-image-1756 alignleft" alt="Traditional architecture on a budget" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/k_kirk_11_1.jpg" width="490" height="327" />

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

The final cost on this project was just $185 a sq foot.

<img class="size-full wp-image-1748 alignleft" alt="Traditional architecture on a budget" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/10/c_kirk_3.jpg" width="490" height="327" />

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;

&nbsp;



To see more of pictures this project, please visit our website <a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Kirkland_Farmhouse.html">HERE</a>

	<item>
		<title>New Home Sales Are On the Rise</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/11/07/new-home-sales-are-on-the-rise/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 07 Nov 2013 19:38:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1763</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[As the economy struggles to right itself, mortgage rates have steadily increased after record lows just a few years earlier. Though many people were still reluctant to make a home purchase at the first sign of the increase, the trend seems to be reversing as an increase in August new home sales indicates.

[caption id="attachment_1768" align="aligncenter" width="500"]<a href="http://www.shutterstock.com/pic-113589817/stock-photo-miniature-model-house-and-keys-resting-on-a-female-hand.html?src=PgvO6kuPa3-aCYzi4ngKUg-1-6" target="_blank"><img class=" wp-image-1768  " title="housing market" alt="housing market" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2013/11/shutterstock_113589817.jpg?w=560" width="500" height="361" /></a> Source: Shutter Stock[/caption]

Up by almost eight percent, the housing market is finally picking back up again in three out of four regions - the Midwest, and the Southern and Northeastern areas of the nation - despite increased interest rates. This is believed to be because people are coming to terms with <a href="http://www.forbes.com/sites/trulia/2013/09/11/how-long-before-mortgage-rates-hurt-housing/" target="_blank">increasing interest rates on home mortgages</a>.

Apparently, potential home buyers have realized that, as interest rates continue to climb without a break in sight, buying a home now is more important than ever, and waiting too long to take the plunge could result in thousands of dollars worth of additional interest throughout the life of the loan.

Another factor contributing to the increase in new home sales, as opposed to the purchase of older homes, is the modern push towards energy efficiency. As the price for crude oil rises, the pull toward energy-efficient, or green, homes becomes a necessity. Fortunately, many designers understand the appeal of <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/tag/eco-friendly-architecture/" target="_blank">sustainable housing</a> and design new homes accordingly.

Despite rising mortgage rates and increased new home sales tags, more and more people are continuing to buy. And because rates will continue to climb, there has never been a better time to make the move to home ownership.

If you are considering the purchase of a new home, or if you just want to increase the value of your existing property, Gelotte Hommas Architecture can help. To learn more about what Gelotte Hommas can do for you, <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">contact us</a> today!]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>

	<item>
		<title>Ensure That Your New Kitchen Has Plenty of Space</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/11/19/ensure-that-your-new-kitchen-has-plenty-of-space/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 19 Nov 2013 15:34:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1771</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Anyone who has ever dealt with a cramped or poorly laid out kitchen knows just how frustrating it can be. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2011/04/28/how-to-make-the-most-of-a-small-kitchen/" target="_blank">Small work spaces</a> make cooking with a partner near impossible and little to no storage means things get stored on counters thus reducing what little work space you already have. But, carefully planning your kitchen floor plan before you build or remodel can make the time you spend in your kitchen much more enjoyable.</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/1120795/Bohemian-Condo-eclectic-kitchen-chicago" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="preventing small kitchen problems" alt="preventing small kitchen problems" src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/df71fb200fe89893_8-7097/eclectic-kitchen.jpg" width="500" height="334" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small><a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/eclectic/kitchen">Eclectic Kitchen</a> by <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/professionals/interior-designer/c/Lake-Forest--IL">Lake Forest Interior Designers &amp; Decorators</a> <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/pro/lisawolfedesign/lisa-wolfe-design-ltd">Lisa Wolfe Design, Ltd</a> via Houzz</small></div>
Before tearing into your kitchen over-haul, remember to plan the following:
<ul>
	<li><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Walkways:</b><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> Make sure you <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/16173117/list/9-Ways-to-Avoid-Kitchen-Traffic-Jams/" target="_blank">include ample room</a> to move around your kitchen by providing walkways that are at least 36 inches wide. If you plan on having an island with stools or chairs, be sure to take into account the walk-space when chairs are pulled out to help prevent tripping or spilling.</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Work space:</b><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> Work spaces also require extra room to move, which includes 42 to 46 inches of work room around prep areas such as cutting boards and sinks. Because the refrigerator is also a hot spot in the kitchen, give that plenty of breathing room, too, by keeping it away from easily congested areas such as your kitchen's entrance or dining area.</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Storage:</b> You don't have to have a lot of storage space to get good use out of it. Consider clever ways to add storage to the space you have, like using pull-out shelving or up-right storage. Because, even a small kitchen needs to be functional.</li>
</ul>
See that your kitchen is designed with  high-traffic needs in mind by planning the perfect floor plan.

Learn more about how to create the perfect kitchen floor plan by contacting <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a>.]]></content:encoded>
