	<item>
		<title>Choosing a Home Style? Think Grand With a Mountain Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/01/24/choosing-a-home-style-think-grand-with-a-mountain-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 24 Jan 2014 23:19:00 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1895</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Wouldn't you like your home to stand out from the crowd? If you're more interested in standing out in a good way than in blending in with the masses, consider making your next home a mountain home. Our <a href="http://gelottehommas.com/" target="_blank">talented Seattle-area architects and design experts</a> at Gelotte Hommas Architecture can guide you through the process of designing a home that you're happy to call your own.</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/95994/Side-Exterior-of-Cedar-Haven-Home-contemporary-exterior-seattle" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="mountain style home design" alt="mountain style home design" src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/17b1db400d10f4dc_8-7221/contemporary-exterior.jpg" width="500" height="374" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small><a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/contemporary/exterior">Contemporary Exterior</a> by <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/professionals/architect/c/Bellevue--WA">Bellevue Architects &amp; Designers</a> <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/pro/gelottehommas/gelotte-hommas-architecture">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> via Houzz</small></div>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/587987/list/Mountain-Homes--Big-Design-for-Majestic-Places" target="_blank">Traditional American mountain homes</a> date back to the 19th century. This style was well-suited to the wooded, sloped land in the Blue Ridge and Adirondack Mountains, and it evolved out of the need to create homes that did not get bogged down by the heavy rain and and snow. The gable roofs, which are a prime example of mountain home architecture, accomplished this goal. Big, rustic timbers are used to support these roofs and also to form the sides of the home. It is these rustic timbers that give mountain homes their signature look.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Another prime characteristic of mountain homes is a stone foundation. This makes the home sturdy, anchoring it to uneven land. This adds to the rustic look of a mountain home. Often, stone chimneys are used to compliment the exposed stone foundations.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you love large windows and plenty of sunlight, a mountain home is certainly for you. These homes feature large picture windows, which allow you to look out onto your land and the surrounding countryside. Most also have large, homey porches, which are perfect for enjoying a meal outdoors or an evening under the stars.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">At Gelotte Hommas Architecture, we take pride in helping our clients create homes that exceed their expectations, both functionally and visually. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us </a>to learn more about our services and start designing your new Seattle-area home.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ideas for Adding an Artful Wine Cellar to Your Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/01/28/ideas-for-adding-an-artful-wine-cellar-to-your-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 29 Jan 2014 00:03:02 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1897</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you love sipping on a glass of vino at the end of a long day, than your new home simply must feature a wine cellar. When designing a home, you have <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/9666812/list/8-Wine-Cellars-Overflowing-With-Artful-Storage" target="_blank">many wine cellar options</a>.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Here is a look at some of the more artful choices:</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/153409/Lakeside-Lookout-Wine-Cellar-mediterranean-wine-cellar-seattle"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="wine cellar design ideas" alt="wine cellar design ideas" src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/00d1f0f40d94e118_8-3117/mediterranean-wine-cellar.jpg" width="500" height="666" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small><a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/mediterranean/wine-cellar">Mediterranean Wine Cellar</a> by <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/professionals/architect/c/Bellevue--WA">Bellevue Architects &amp; Designers</a> <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/pro/gelottehommas/gelotte-hommas-architecture">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> via Houzz</small></div>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Reserve Wine Racking System</b>. This wine racking system allows you to see each bottle's label, so you never have to sort through bottle after bottle to find the perfect one for your dinner party. It also shows off your collection as it grows. Bottles are displayed on an angle on lower shelves, and then laid on their sides, with the labels showing, on upper shelves. Let Gelette Hommas Architecture help you design the beautiful wooden racks needed for this type of system.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Custom X-Style Storage</b>. Storing wine in x-style storage shelves allows you to keep a large amount of wine in a smaller space. Using stone and beautiful mohogany wood creates a warm, inviting touch. Of course, you can <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">custom design your wine cellar</a> to feature a few upper shelves where you can leave your more popular bottles displayed vertically for easy reference.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Nek Rite System.</b> This is a unique system that uses metal pegs to hold bottles in place horizontally. You can use it throughout your entire wine cellar, or integrate it into part of a larger wood design. It has a high-end, modern look, but is an affordable choice.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Designing a home can be an overwhelming burden to undertake without guidance. There are so many choices to make, and if you don't have a lot of experience, even the simplest of choices can be overwhelming. Let the experienced architects and designers at Gelotte Hommas Architecture guide you though the process. <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Contact.html" target="_blank">Contact us</a> today to get started.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ideas for Building a Stone Fireplace</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/01/31/ideas-for-building-a-stone-fireplace/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 31 Jan 2014 18:10:03 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1899</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A stone fireplace adds special character to your home. It's a centerpiece that sets the mood of your living room, and even of your entire home. Not all stone fireplaces are created equal, however. Here are a few ideas to help you <a href="http://www.bhg.com/decorating/fireplace/styles/stone-fireplace-design-ideas/#page=12" target="_blank">choose the fireplace design</a> that's right for your home.</p>

<div><a href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/578619/Classic-arts-and-crafts-style-architecture-traditional-living-room-seattle" target="_blank"><img class="aligncenter" style="border:0;" title="designing a fireplace" alt="designing a fireplace" src="http://st.houzz.com/simgs/0b6106840f3d4317_8-1502/traditional-living-room.jpg" width="490" height="380" border="0" /></a></div>
<div style="color:#444444;text-align:center;"><small><a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/photos/traditional/living-room">Traditional Living Room</a> by <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/professionals/architect/c/Bellevue--WA">Bellevue Architects &amp; Designers</a> <a style="text-decoration:none;color:#444;" href="http://www.houzz.com/pro/gelottehommas/gelotte-hommas-architecture">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> via Houzz</small></div>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Country-Style</b>: Create a country-style fireplace by using granite blocks arranged in rustic stacks without any mortar. This style, which is often referred to as dry stacking, is wonderful when paired with light-colored walls. The gray granite blocks make your room look larger when the fire is glowing inside of them.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Bold</b>: For a very bold, outstanding look, a tall fireplace that reaches from the floor to the ceiling is a wonderful choice. It looks especially impressive if paired with a vaulted ceiling. When designing a home, you need a special feature like this to be the focal point. Setting it against white or light-colored walls makes it stand out even more. Because of the height of this type of fireplace, you'll need to use strong stone material and mortar made to withstand the weight.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The freestanding fireplace</b>: Create a freestanding fireplace by relying on sturdy, cultured stone. Whether you choose a floor-to-ceiling design or a shorter one, this type of fireplace allows you to create interesting patterns with the stones, thus decreasing your need for additional decoration in the surrounding area. What makes a fireplace freestanding? It can be installed without reinforcing floor joists.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you need help designing a home that is brimming with the true art of architecture, be sure to <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">contact us</a> at Gelotte Hommas Architecture. Our <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/our-work/" target="_blank">Seattle-area professional architects</a> can put together a comprehensive plan for designing your dream home.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1899</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_id>1926</wp:post_id>

	<item>
		<title>Make Nature Meet the Modern In Your Home</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/12/make-nature-meet-the-modern-in-your-home/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 12 Mar 2014 19:12:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1911</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">You probably associate natural home building materials with old-fashioned homes. However, when used the right way, natural and environmentally friendly building supplies can enhance the modern look of your house.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1932" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Cedar_Haven.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1932 " title="incorporating nature into a home" alt="incorporating nature into a home" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/large_5.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Use these tips and tricks to <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/17421626/list/When-Mother-Nature-Meets-Your-Modern-Nature" target="_blank">integrate natural materials into your home's modern architecture</a>:</p>

<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Live edge slab tables are becoming quite common in modern homes. Live edge slabs are slices of wood cut from fallen trees; the edges are left natural. They have a very rustic look, but compliment minimalist decor and are also an environmentally-friendly alternative to tables made from milled wood.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Using textured, natural wooden beams to create exposed ceiling beams in a kitchen or dining room adds instant character to your room. The beams can be finished with a clear, natural finish for protection that does not cause discoloration.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">There is nothing more natural than a full view of nature. If you have a beautiful backyard, or even a nice front yard, consider installing a floor-to-ceiling window so that you can enjoy the nice view through every season. Use long, full curtains to frame the window and to shut out light at night.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A fireplace is perfect for curling up on a chilly winter night. Many of today's fireplaces are made with synthetic materials, but you can have one built with natural wood for a rustic feeling. To make it look more modern, choose a design that reaches from floor to ceiling.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Enhance the look of the natural wood in your home by installing plenty of lighting. Using modern industrial-style fixtures, such as simple stainless steel pendant fixtures, keeps your home looking chic.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Are you considering remodeling your home or building a new one? <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> at Gelotte Hommas Architecture, and learn more about our modern architecture and interior decorating services that include natural materials.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ideas for Creating the Perfect Farmhouse Style </title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/02/03/ideas-for-creating-the-perfect-farmhouse-style-kirkland-farmhouse/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 03 Feb 2014 19:02:43 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1913</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">You don't have to live in the country to live in a farmhouse-style home. This traditional style creates a feeling of warmth wherever you are. Farmhouse style houses always make you feel right at home when you return to them after a long day at work. Whether you've already decided on a farmhouse style home or are still considering it as one of several options, these ideas offer a little <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">inspiration for designing a home</a>.</p>[caption id="attachment_1919" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Kirkland_Farmhouse.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1919 " title="designing a farmhouse " alt="designing a farmhouse " src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/a_kirk_1.jpg" width="490" height="327" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas's Portfolio[/caption]<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A wrap-around porch can make any home feel warm and cozy. This is a common feature on farmhouse style homes, and it's an easy one to work into most building plans. A large porch is visually pleasing, and it's also functional -- it gives you a place to sit and read, eat with family, and display flower baskets.</li></ul><ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Traditional American farmhouses are often lit with classic lanterns. You can find lantern-style light fixtures that create this look in your modern farmhouse style home.</li></ul><ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Cotton is the fabric most often used in farmhouses. Choose cotton curtains, throw rugs and even cotton-covered furniture to enhance the architectural style of your home.</li></ul><ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Farmhouses are always full of bright light. Ensure that yours has plenty of light by building large picture windows or even vast bay windows into your home design.</li></ul><ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Your house looks even nicer when sunlight bounces off of real wood. Both treated and natural, untreated wood can be used in a farmhouse style home. Think wooden window frames, plenty of natural wooden furniture, and beautiful hardwood floors.</li></ul><p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">At Gelotte Hommas Architecture, we believe that designing a home is a true work of art and architecture. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Give us a call</a> when you're ready to discuss your options; we'd love to help design the farmhouse style home of your dreams.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>How to Create Your Dream Garage Space </title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/02/06/how-to-create-your-dream-garage-space/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 06 Feb 2014 17:02:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1915</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When was the last time that you spent more than a few hours in your garage? Most people have garages, but few people love theirs enough to put them to good use. If you are thinking of <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/701100/list/5-Dream-Garage-Spaces" target="_blank">remodeling your garage</a>, or even of building a new one while <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/our-work/" target="_blank">designing a home</a>, use these tips and ideas for inspiration.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1926" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/The_Garaj_Mahal.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1926 " title="creating a man cave" alt="creating a man cave" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/ustom-man-cave.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas's Portfolio[/caption]
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you love to tinker with cars, motorcycles or other vehicles, one of the most important elements of your ideal garage is space. You need plenty of floor space to take things apart, house one or more cars, and store your tools. You'll also want a sealed floor, as this is much easier to clean up if you make a spill.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Do you want to use your garage for entertaining? Pick a theme, and run with it. For example, you could decorate your garage like a 1950's diner. Put in a black and white checkered floor, a red-topped bar, and maybe even some built-in booths.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you need a little extra office space, your garage could do the trick. Consider designating a slice of space in the back as an office. This can be separate from your regular garage space, which you can use to store your car and tools.</li>
</ul>
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Maybe you have always wanted your own private art studio. Your garage could be it! With a sealed floor, industrial ceiling, and plenty of natural light from large windows, you'll have the space of your dreams.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Designing a home is a big project, even if you are only re-doing a garage or a single room. Gelotte Hommas Architecture offers an experienced team of architects and designers who can ensure that the end result is exactly what you want. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us today</a> to discuss your plans and learn more about our services.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>What Walls of Glass Can Do for Your Home </title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/02/10/what-walls-of-glass-can-do-for-your-home-casa-del-sol/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 10 Feb 2014 23:02:44 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1917</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Design.html" target="_blank">designing a home</a>, you have so many options to consider. One that is certainly worth a few hours of contemplation is including more glass. Glass allows plenty of light to shine through, and there are plenty of <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/771055/list/Give-Me-a-Wall--a-Roof--or-a-House-of-Glass" target="_blank">ways to incorporate glass into your home's architecture</a>.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1929" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://gelottehommas.com/completed/Casa_Del_Sol.html"><img class="size-full wp-image-1929" alt="benefits of big windows" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/01/large_61.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<h2 style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><span style="text-decoration:underline;"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Benefits of Glass</b></span></h2>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Including plenty of glass in your home certainly enhances the beauty of the rest of your home's features by letting plenty of natural light shine through. If you have a lot of wood in your design, it looks better in natural light. Colors appear more vibrant, and the mood is made more lighthearted. Allowing all of that natural light inside also makes it easier to keep houseplants looking fresh. Imagine an expansive living room with a floor-to-ceiling window and plenty of fresh, lush plants -- nothing is more beautiful.</p>

<h2 style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><span style="text-decoration:underline;"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Ways to Incorporate More Glass</b></span></h2>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Floor-to-ceiling windows and expansive picture windows are just one of the many ways to incorporate more glass into your home. Some modern homes now feature glass ceilings. These let you stare out into the clouds, creating a modern, yet natural feel. Glass walls are also becoming more common. These look great in outside corridors. For a greenhouse-style room, you can combine a glass ceiling with a glass floor. You'll be amazed how warm the sunlight keeps it, and you get a great view of your backyard, too.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">One of the secrets to designing a home that satisfies your every need is having a talented team of architects and designers on your side. At Gelotte Hommas Architecture, we truly believe that <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/the-art-of-architiecture/" target="_blank">architecture is an art,</a> and it's our goal to help you create a beautiful masterpiece. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> today to talk about your building plans and design ideas.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>The Benefits of Having an Open Floor Plan </title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/19/the-benefits-of-having-an-open-floor-plan/</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 19 Mar 2014 19:30:37 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1937</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/09/25/designing-the-perfect-open-floor-plan-for-your-home/" target="_blank">Open floor plan designs</a> in homes and apartments have been around for a long time. However, in 2014, they’re particularly popular, and that popularity doesn’t seem like it’s going to fade anytime soon. That’s because open floor plan designs have a wide variety of benefits for homeowners and renters – ones that make day to day life much more enjoyable for many people, as opposed to more traditional closed floor plans.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1958" align="alignright" width="343"]<a href="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/gelotte-hommas_gorgeous_white_kitchen.png"><img class=" wp-image-1958 " title="Gelotte Hommas_gorgeous_white_kitchen" alt="Gelotte Hommas_gorgeous_white_kitchen" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/gelotte-hommas_gorgeous_white_kitchen.png" width="343" height="266" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<ul style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Having an open floor plan can make a small house feel considerably larger than its actual square footage. This works because when dividing walls are knocked down you’ll have a much longer and wider sightline. An open floor plan design is especially good for renovating homes with small rooms for this exact reason.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2013/05/29/home-design-with-your-life-in-mind-the-entertainer/" target="_blank">Entertaining</a> guests becomes much easier in a home with an open floor plan. If you’re the type of person who loves to throw a party or have groups over dinner, an open floor plan can make getting more than a few people in a room much easier. It also makes the atmosphere quite lively.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">A floor plan with few walls allows more natural light into your home. That means you won’t have rooms that are dark and rooms that are too light, and the flow of light in your home can be energizing during the daylight hours. Of course, you can always use window treatments when it’s too much.</li>
	<li style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Open floor plans are practical for families who have children. In fact, watching children in an open floor plan home is a lot easier, which can actually keep your kids safe. It’s not something many people think about when designing a home’s floor plan, but it can really be a helpful benefit for many families.</li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact Gelotte Hommas</a> for more information on beneficial open floor plan designs.</p>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Try an L-Shaped House Plan to Let Each Room Have a View</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/06/try-an-l-shaped-house-plan-to-let-each-room-have-a-view-the-point/</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 06 Mar 2014 20:12:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1939</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Form and function are important features when you are designing a home for comfort and aesthetic value. The L-shaped house plan provides a way to achieve both and much more. At <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/home.html" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas</a>, our L-shaped home designs are beautiful as well as functional in many ways. They provide efficient use of land, unique views, and privacy.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1948" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/The_Point.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1948 " alt="L-Shaped homes provide views and privacy" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/lshape.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The <a href="http://www.houzz.com/ideabooks/906903/list/Great-Compositions--The-L-Shaped-House-Plan" target="_blank">L-shaped home plan</a> works for a variety of lot sizes. The L-shape allows an efficient use of space where you can build up or around the perimeter of your lot. Your built-up home provides of <a href="http://www.ehow.com/info_10056716_l-shaped-house-ideas.html" target="_blank">privacy for bedrooms</a>, in one wing the home, and space for living and socializing in the second wing.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Since your rooms are designed around the shape of your home, each room has a unique view. The L-shape allows the area around your rooms to be open and <a href="http://www.morehouseplans.net/l-shaped-house-plans-l-shaped-style-house/" target="_blank">free of the encumbrance</a> of a wall or other structure associated with another portion of your home. This shape provides spectacular views from your living and recreation spaces. Your family will enjoy taking in the natural outdoor scenes. Access to your swimming pool or outdoor patio can be established in several different places within your home.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The L-shaped home provides another level of privacy while you entertain outdoors. Your home becomes a natural hedge that surrounds a portion of your outdoor entertaining area. Nature can become another part of the enclosure and you will have a completely private outdoor location for many days and nights of entertainment and relaxation.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">We design <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/Completed.html" target="_blank">beautiful homes</a> that provide form and functionality. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> to help you design a home that is perfect for your family and lifestyle.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Ideas for Building the Perfect Cottage</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/10/ideas-for-building-the-perfect-cottage-storybook-cottage/</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 10 Mar 2014 17:24:38 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1941</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The perfect cottage-style home is a dream for many people, but they can be hard to come by in the real estate market. While there may not be many on the market, there are plenty of ways to get a <a href="http://www.bhg.com/home-improvement/exteriors/curb-appeal/cottage-style-home-ideas/" target="_blank">storybook cottage</a> of your very own, just use the following ideas:</p>


[caption id="attachment_1950" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/Storybook_Cottage.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1950 " alt="Get Storybook Cottage Style" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/03/dormer.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<ul>
	<li><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">The traditional storybook cottage generally features dormer windows. Dormer windows on the second floor creates a second floor space on a home that would traditionally only be one floor. Dormers can also be added to cape-style homes to extend the living space and alter it into one of the cottage style homes you've been coveting.</span><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> </span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Storybook cottages are also all about the natural exterior, specifically in Seattle. Seattle is known for its use of natural brick and stone for home exteriors. Storybook cottages do the same, and a stone facade can be added to any home to give it a more "cottage" appearance. Natural stone work can be found in many homes designed by Gelotte Hommas.</span></li>
</ul>
<ul>
	<li><span style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you don't have a home that can be turned into one of the cottage style homes you've seen by adding dormers, adding a storybook porch might be the next best thing. Wrap around style porches are common in movie homes and the storybook cottages that were a part of childhood fairytales. Adding a porch to a home is an easy way to change the style, and it also offers a convenient outdoor space for the warmer months. </span></li>
</ul>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you are interested in working with a company that knows how to make your storybook dreams into a reality <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">contact us</a> with any and all questions you may have.</p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
		<title>Building a Home? Consider Normandy Style</title>
		<link>http://blog.gelottehommas.com/2014/03/04/building-a-home-consider-normandy-style/</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 04 Mar 2014 23:47:39 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator>gelottehommas</dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://gelottehommasblog.wordpress.com/?p=1943</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When planning to build a new home it's important to find the perfect style and design that truly matches your unique taste. Normandy style homes remain a popular choice among homeowners due to their Romanesque feel that mimics many of the stunning aspects often found in European castles, cathedrals, and churches.  Here at Gelotte Hommas Architecture we have been designing these <a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/A_Touch_of_Normandy.html" target="_blank">one of a kind homes</a> for our satisfied clients for over 60 years.</p>


[caption id="attachment_1945" align="aligncenter" width="490"]<a href="http://www.gelottehommas.com/completed/A_Touch_of_Normandy.html" target="_blank"><img class="size-full wp-image-1945 " alt="Normandy Style House" src="http://gelottehommasblog.files.wordpress.com/2014/02/custom_pool_house_9.png" width="490" height="380" /></a> Source: Gelotte Hommas[/caption]
<h2 style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">About The Design</b></h2>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Normandy style homes have a romantic appeal that's hard to match while still retaining that cozy and comfortable atmosphere that homeowners crave. By implementing dramatic touches into their architecture, such as rounded arches and finely crafted stonework, the stunning homes have an awe-inspiring look that's reminiscent of 18th-20th century buildings.</p>

<h2 style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">Features Of A Normandy Style Home</b></h2>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">When planning the home's architectural design, the addition of rounded towers, cone shaped roofs, and high-arched doorways are just a few of the features commonly chosen when designing Normandy style homes. By mixing together simple with the complex, the home retains a roomy feel without seeming overly dramatic, which makes it perfect for a homeowner's everyday life. Ornate and intricate patterns within the stonework play up the home's design to create a romantic and ethereal atmosphere that visitors will fall in love with time after time.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);">If you're interested in Normandy style homes we're here to ensure that your dream becomes a reality. Here at <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/about/" target="_blank">Gelotte Hommas Architecture</a> we pride ourselves in providing our customers with top notch service and unmatched architectural design. <a href="http://blog.gelottehommas.com/contact-us/" target="_blank">Contact us</a> today to learn more about our professional services and to discover how we can bring your ideas to life.</p>
<p style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"><b style="background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0);"> </b></p>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
